level.heading: Tax treatment of plan.
level.text: The replacement plan described in § 1-905.01 shall be deemed a "governmental plan" as defined in § 414(d) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, approved September 2, 1974 (88 Stat. 926; 26 U.S.C. § 414(d)), and all benefits provided therefrom shall be deemed governmental plan benefits maintained by the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1002 of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-152, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-901.01.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Application of Law 12-152: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1- 901.01.
